articles.author: Dana Kennedy
articles.title: COVID-19 deaths surge in Latin America with more than 1M dead - New York Post
articles.description: The region now has the world’s highest per capita death rate.
articles.content:
More than 1 million people have died from COVID-19 in Latin America and the Caribbean as the pandemic worsens in the region, which now has the world’s highest per capita death rate.
Along with India… [+1541 chars]

articles.author: Roy Luarca
articles.title: Spence better matchup for Pacquiao than Crawford, says 'Pacman' trainer - Rappler
articles.description: Although Errol Spence is much younger and more active than Manny Pacquiao, Nonoy Neri says the American champion 'might be in for a big surprise'
articles.content: "Crawford is a better [fighter] than Spence in my opinion," Neri, one of Pacquiao's trainers, said on Saturday, May 22.
